text: Edward Joseph Walsh (March 5, 1942 â€“ February 14, 2014) was an American journalist. He reported on politics. He made news reports from foreign countries. He worked for The Washington Post and The Oregonian.Ed Walsh, former Washington Post and Oregonian reporter, dead at 71 Walsh was born in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at the College of St. Thomas. He died in Portland, Oregon, from lung cancer. He was aged 71.Edward Walsh, former Washington Post political reporter, dies at 71 ==References== ==Other websites== * Obituary in The Oregonian * Walsh recaps career for The Oregonian (2009) * "Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night" Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Journalists from Chicago Category:American editors
title: Edward J. Walsh
